value.name: Vancouver Civil Rights Groups Want More Police Oversight
value.description: Unlike many cities, Vancouver does not have a citizen-led review board of its police. Michele Thompson, Carlos Hunter's former partner and mother to his seven-year-old son Gabrial, embraces family ...

value.name: Vancouver Residents Weigh In On Police Use Of Force
value.description: The audience included family members of individuals who had been killed by police officers. One of them was Pam Hunter, the sister of Carlos Hunter, who was fatally shot by police in March.

value.name: Washington governor signs sweeping police reform measures
value.description: Jay Inslee to sign 12 bills about police accountability at the Eastside Community Center in Tacoma, Wash., on Tuesday, May 18, 2021. Nickeia Hunter is the sister of Carlos Hunter, who was killed ...

value.name: Washington state families celebrate progress on police reform, name future priorities
value.description: The Washington Coalition for Police Accountability held a press conference the last day of the 2021 legislative session April 25, to talk about progress made and future priorities. Sara Gentzler ...
